title: Standing Nude
medium: oil on paper mounted on paper board
credit_line: Purchased through the generosity of Mrs. Alan M. Scaife and family
provenance_text:
Edouard Vuillard [1868-1940]. Gaston Bernheim de Villers [1870-1953], Paris, France [1]; Bernheim Family Collection, Paris, France; M. Knoedler & Company, Inc., New York, NY; Grant J. Pick [1910-1963], Chicago, IL, until 1963; bequest to Art Institute of Chicago [1879-], Chicago, IL, 1963; (sold at Parke-Bernet Galleries, New York, NY, April 14, 1965, lot 79) [2]; purchased by Museum, May 1965 [3]. 
NOTES:1. Also referred to as Gaston de Villers, Gaston Bernheim-Jeune, and Gaston Bernheim.  2. Sale no. 2344, "Impressionist and Modern Paintings, Sculptures, Drawings" listed as "Property of a Midwestern Educational Institution" 3. Updated by CGK July 2012.

creator.death_place: Baule, la (Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France)
